Question: What are the names of some famous actors that started their careers on Broadway?
A: Some famous actors who got their start on Broadway include  Marlon Brando, Katharine Hepburn, James Dean, Julie Andrews, and Robert Redford. You might also be interested in knowing that many plays that were written for Broadway had their start on the Great White Way. These include The Sound of Music, Cats, Phantom of the Opera, and Chicago. Some other well-known plays that started on Broadway include The Producers, The Odd Couple, Wicked, and Les Miserables.
